name: Cube and Genie: Roll The Dice
name_original: Cube and Genie: Roll The Dice
description: It's a little platformer that challenges your... luck? Anyways, this Genie wants to kill you for not letting him rob your house with no 911 call. Your job is to escape your job's building (Which was destroyed by the Genie), by gambli- I mean, rolling the dice with him to pass, this is a very short concept... I had one day ok?! Lol, anyways, give me feedback please. This is my first actually finished game, so I hope this interests you, happy gambli- I mean rolling! :), Submission to the Mini Jam 83, Limitation : A dice MUST be a core mechanic.
